__NOTICE:: Copy this to config.json and edit your details
google_cse_id: Your Google CSE search engine ID
apiai_token: The API key of your API.AI chatbot
github_username: The name of your user's account
github_token: The Personal Access Token of that account
mainguild: The guild's id this bot has been installed for
juiceid: ID of the Raspberry juice emoji
ownerid: ID of the bot's owner, use \@YourUsernameHere or the command whoami to find it out
